remarks: The partial isomorphism A for a lattice ` K ` is a one-to-one function. Part of Lemma M of [Crawley] p. 120 line 27.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dibcl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dibcl.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoB ` K ) ` W ) $.
dibf11N $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> I : dom I -1-1-onto-> ran I ) $.
